definition-item.definition-title: HAND-PROPELLED VEHICLES, e.g. HAND CARTS OR PERAMBULATORS; SLEDGES (characterised by animal propulsion B62C; propulsion of sledges by driver or engine B62M)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

"Hand carts" also embraces hand-propelled wheeled devices in so far as the features thereof are generic to hand carts and also embraces pedestrian controlled power-driven vehicles in so far as the features thereof are generic to hand carts.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Propulsion of sledges by driver or engine

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Chairs or personal conveyances specially adapted for disabled persons
Vehicles with the driver not being seated
Devices for moving or tilting heavy loads

section-body.paragraph-text: Although wheels or skis can be mounted to almost every mechanical item, not every such item should be classified in B62B; e.g. items characterised by their functions for special applications are classified in the appropriate subclasses, e.g. office furniture on wheels in A47B, lawn-mowers in A01D34/00, wheeled vacuum cleaners in A47L, etc.

synonyms.paragraph-text: In patent documents, the following words/expressions are often used as synonyms:

definition-item.definition-title: Hand carts having only one axis carrying one or more transport wheels; Equipment therefor

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Hand carts with only a single wheel axis and hand carts with a single wheel axis that can be converted to a two-axis hand cart

definition-item.definition-title: involving parts being adjustable, collapsible, attachable, detachable, or convertible

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Adjustable or convertible hand-propelled vehicles or sledges

definition-item.definition-title: in which the load is intended to be transferred totally to the wheels

section-body.paragraph-text: Sack barrows should normally be classified here, irrespective of their loading condition that may influence the weight distribution

definition-item.definition-title: involving parts being adjustable, collapsible, attachable, detachable, or convertible

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Adjustable or convertible hand-propelled vehicles or sledges

definition-item.definition-title: involving parts being collapsible, attachable, detachable or convertible

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Adjustable or convertible hand-propelled vehicles or sledges

definition-item.definition-title: Hand carts having more than one axis carrying transport wheels; Steering devices therefor; Equipment therefor {(convertible from one-axled to two-axled vehicle B62B1/002)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Hand carts with at least two wheel axes, one behind the other
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Hand carts having more than one wheel axis that can be converted into single-axis hand carts
Hand carts having essentially one wheel axis and a load being disposed between this wheel axis and the handles and comprising an additional wheel, e.g. wheel mounted on a strut

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Vehicles with the driver not being seated

definition-item.definition-title: {characterised by a rectangular shape, involving sidewalls or racks}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: {Coaster wagons}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Hand carts with side walls and drawbar, commonly used for transporting children, beer crates, etc.

synonyms.paragraph-text: In patent documents, the following words/expressions are often used as synonyms:

definition-item.definition-title: involving parts being adjustable, collapsible, attachable, detachable or convertible

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Hand-propelled vehicles or sledges being foldable or dismountable when not in use
Adjustable or convertible hand-propelled vehicles or sledges

definition-item.definition-title: {Foldable roll containers}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

"roll containers" which can be folded in some way to achieve a smaller storage volume, for example by folding down their side walls, by folding up the bottom, etc. The term "roll container" means that the container is being provided with wheels, casters or the like to enable the container to be rolled along a surface. The term "foldable" refers to the "container" as a whole, and not only to the rolls.
Collapsible or detachable roll containers are also covered by this group.

definition-item.definition-title: {collapsible shopping trolleys}

section-body.paragraph-text: Used also for foldable or detachable shopping trolleys

definition-item.definition-title: for simply clearing the load from the ground (masted lift trucks B66F)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Low-lift hand trucks for transporting goods
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Supporting frames or bases for conveyors

definition-item.definition-title: {the objects being bags}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Bags or containers specially adapted to a basket, e.g. a basket of a shopping cart

definition-item.definition-title: characterised by provisions for nesting or stacking, e.g. shopping trolleys {(collapsible shopping trolleys B62B3/027)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Means for facilitating stowing or transporting of the trolleys; Antitheft arrangements (B62B5/0423 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Braking or blocking when leaving a particular area

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Storing or handling self-service hand-carts or baskets

definition-item.definition-title: {Display devices mounted on it, e.g. advertisement displays}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Mobile visual advertising by land vehicles
Advertising on or in articles for restaurants, shops or offices

definition-item.definition-title: {Mounting of toys}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: {Supports for specific articles (B62B3/1468 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Adaptations for calculators, memory aids, reading aids
Bags or containers specially adapted to a basket, e.g. a basket of a shopping cart

definition-item.definition-title: {Adaptations facilitating the transport to the counter}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: {Wheel arrangements}

section-body.paragraph-text: Details of wheel arrangements should additionally be classified in B62B2301/00

definition-item.definition-title: nestable by means of pivoted supports or support parts, e.g. baskets {(B62B3/1476 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Nestable hand carts having a platform as main support

definition-item.definition-title: Accessories or details specially adapted for hand carts ({B62B3/1404} , B62B9/00 take precedence; wheels, axles, or axle bearings for vehicles B60B; castors for vehicles, castors in general B60B33/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Accessories or details for all hand carts irrespective of their number of wheel axes
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Runners for carrying hand carts to facilitate travel on ice or snow

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Bumpers; Safety devices}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Protection covers, e.g. against rain}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Protection covers against rain, sun or germs; attachment of umbrellas or parasols
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Covers for nestable or stackable hand carts

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Non-fixed roofs; roofs with movable panels for vehicles

definition-item.definition-title: {Propulsion aids}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Accessories comprising propulsion means which aid the walking operator to push or pull such a hand cart.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Propulsion aids for prams and strollers

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Motor vehicles characterized by the driver walking

section-body.paragraph-text: Details of propulsion aids for prams and strollers are classified in B62B5/0026.

definition-item.definition-title: {Wheeled supports connected to the transported object}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Wheeled supports not forming a complete hand cart on their own, but only in combination with the load to be transported
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Equipment attachable to vessels for facilitating transport over land
Wheeled devices for moving or tilting heavy loads

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Identification of the cart or merchandise, e.g. by barcodes or radio frequency identification [RFID]}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: providing for travelling up or down a flight of stairs (chairs or multi-track cycles specially adapted for invalids A61G5/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Perambulators providing for travelling up or down a flight of stairs
Wheelchairs with obstacle mounting facilities, e.g. for climbing stairs

definition-item.definition-title: Braking mechanisms; Locking devices against movement

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Hand moving equipment, e.g. handle bars (for cycles B62K11/14, B62K21/12)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Handles of rigid or semi-rigid containers

definition-item.definition-title: {Platforms to stand upon}

section-body.paragraph-text: B62B5/087 is used in addition to B62B9/28 for classifying platforms for children's carriages to stand upon

definition-item.definition-title: Carriages for children; Perambulators, e.g. dolls' perambulators

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
Generic features of any type of carriage for children, perambulator or dolls perambulator

definition-item.definition-title: {Carriages supporting a hammock-style seat}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: {Carriages supporting a rigid seat (when detachable or rotatable B62B7/145)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: The body usable as a child's seat in a vehicle

definition-item.definition-title: {three wheeled}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Carriages for children having three wheels only, whereby a double wheel is considered as one wheel

definition-item.definition-title: {Coupling unit between front wheels, rear wheels and handle}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
In side view, the frame part holding the front wheels, the frame part holding the rear wheels and the handles meeting at a common coupling unit

definition-item.definition-title: {becoming smaller in all three dimensions}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The wheel axes are moved towards each other, the right and left wheels or sides are moved towards each other, and the handle is retracted or folded

definition-item.definition-title: convertible, e.g. into children's furniture or toy (children's chairs convertible to pushchairs A47D1/06)

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Children's chairs convertibe to a push chair

section-body.paragraph-text: Perambulators convertible into children's chairs should be classified in B62B7/12 as well as in A47D1/06

definition-item.definition-title: {from seat to bed (B62B7/147, B62B9/104 take precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: The seat being rotatable as a whole to transform from seating to lying
Seats with adjustable or reclining backrests

definition-item.definition-title: {into a trailer, e.g. bicycle trailer}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: with detachable or rotatably-mounted body {(the body usable as a child's seat in a vehicle B60N2/2848)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: The body usable as a child's seat in a vehicle

definition-item.definition-title: Accessories or details specially adapted for children's carriages or perambulators (providing for travelling on snow B62B19/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Accessories or constructional details specially adapted for children's carriages or perambulators and not otherwise provided for in B62B7/00
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Runners for carrying children's carriages or perambulators to facilitate travel on ice or snow

section-body.paragraph-text: For propulsion aids use B62B9/00; details of propulsion aids for prams and strollers should be classified in B62B5/0026

definition-item.definition-title: providing for travelling up or down a flight of stairs

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Hand carts provided for travelling up or down a flight of stairs
Wheelchairs with obstacle mounting facilities, e.g. for climbing stairs

definition-item.definition-title: Braking mechanisms; Locking devices against movement

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
Details of brakes for prams and strollers should additionally also be classified in B62B5/04

definition-item.definition-title: {by locking in a braking position}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Brakes being locked in the braking position, e.g. parking brakes

definition-item.definition-title: Perambulator bodies; Equipment therefor (collapsible or foldable B62B7/06; convertible B62B7/12)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: {with adjustable or reclining backrests}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {with head guards}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Vehicle seats for children with head-rests

definition-item.definition-title: involving parts that are adjustable, attachable or detachable {(B62B9/102, B62B9/14 take precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: {Equipment protecting from environmental influences, e.g.} Hoods; Weather screens; Cat nets

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Covers for nestable or stackable hand carts

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Non-fixed roofs; roofs with movable panels for vehicles

definition-item.definition-title: Mud-guards or protecting devices for wheels

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Protection against mud for all types of hand-propelled vehicles

definition-item.definition-title: Resilient suspensions of bodies

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Handle bars; Handles

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Handles of rigid or semi-rigid containers

definition-item.definition-title: Devices for rocking or oscillating

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Securing devices for bags or toys {; Arrangements of racks, bins, trays or other devices for transporting articles}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Auxiliary dismountable seats {; Additional platforms for children in standing-up position}

section-body.paragraph-text: B62B5/087 is used to additionally classify standing platforms of childrens carriages

definition-item.definition-title: Hand-propelled vehicles not otherwise provided for (rider propulsion of vehicles B62M1/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Hand-propelled vehicles not otherwise provided for, such as comprising walking legs, etc.

definition-item.definition-title: Sledges with runners (ice boats or sailing sledges B62B15/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Sledges with runners or ski-like gliding elements
This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: with swivelling portions of the runners; with a swivelling middle runner

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Swivelling runners: pivoting about a vertically oriented axis

definition-item.definition-title: with tilting or bending runners

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Tilting runners: pivoting about a horizontal-longitudinal oriented axis
bending runners: the runners themselves are deformed by bending around vertical axes

definition-item.definition-title: Other sledges; Ice boats or sailing sledges

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Sledges not already provided for in B62B13/00, such as sledges without runners, ice boats or sailing sledges

definition-item.definition-title: {propelled by sails}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Sail or rigging arrangements specially adapted for water sports boards, e.g. for windsurfing or kitesurfing
Sails and rigging of sails for vessels

section-body.paragraph-text: Also used for landsailers on wheels and amphibious landsailers

definition-item.definition-title: {Towed sledges}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Accessories or details of sledges {(propulsion devices for sledges B62M27/00, B62M29/00)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Accessories or details of sledges not otherwise provided for in B62B13/00, in B62B15/00 or in B62B19/00
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Propulsion devices for sledges or the like

definition-item.definition-title: Runners (attachable to or replacing vehicle wheels B62B19/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Braking devices

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Sledges with runners combined with braking devices

definition-item.definition-title: Runners for carrying wheeled vehicles to facilitate travel on ice or snow

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Runners for carrying wheeled hand-propelled vehicles to facilitate travel on ice or snow, thus being more versatile
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Indexing codes relating to type or characteristics of transported articles

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Hand-propelled vehicles or sledges being adapted to transport special articles
This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Gas bottles

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Beverage holders, e.g. for a cup, tin or bottle

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Bales of hay or grass

section-body.paragraph-text: Used also for non-cylindrically bales of hay or grass

definition-item.definition-title: Wheels, tires

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Dustbins, refuse containers

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Flexible bags, e.g. for rubbish

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Refuse receptacle with wheels or rolls

definition-item.definition-title: Suit-cases, other luggage

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Handbags, e.g. shopping bags

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Skis

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: for fishing

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Golf articles, e.g. golfbags

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Persons or animals, dead or alive

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Adaptations for transporting children on shopping carts, etc

definition-item.definition-title: Tools

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Cleaning or gardening articles

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Computers; Screens

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Tiles, bricks, paving slabs or the like

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Service trolleys, e.g. in aircraft

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Service tables adapted to the use in vehicles

definition-item.definition-title: Grasping, holding, supporting the objects

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Details of how to grasp, hold or support the transported objects

definition-item.definition-title: comprising a crane

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: comprising a self levelling surface

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Guiding the forks into the pallets

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: comprising weighing means

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Comprising means for facilitating loading or unloading

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Ventilation; Heating; Cooling; Insulation

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Hand-propelled vehicles or sledges comprising means for ventilation (with or without air-filters), heating, cooling or insulation
This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Catches; Locking or releasing an articulation

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Joining hand-propelled vehicles or sledges together

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Perambulators for two or more children

definition-item.definition-title: Wheel arrangements; Steering; Stability; Wheel suspension

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Details of wheel arrangements, steering, stability, wheel suspension should be classified here when being specially adapted to hand carts.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
Special features of wheels, castors, axles or suspension arrangements should also be classified in B60B or in B60G.

definition-item.definition-title: comprising wheels for longitudinal travelling and wheels for lateral travelling

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Comprising wheels for longitudinal travelling and wheels for lateral travelling, or comprising wheels that can be oriented in different directions for this purpose

definition-item.definition-title: combined with means for braking the wheel

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Steering or braking devices for castor wheels

definition-item.definition-title: comprising additional wheels to increase stability

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Comprising additional wheels, runners or skis to increase stability

definition-item.definition-title: Resilient wheel suspension using springs

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Resilient suspensions of the wheel units using any type of spring

definition-item.definition-title: characterised by the ground engaging elements, e.g. wheel type

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: by using ball-shaped wheels

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: by using roller-shaped wheels

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Manufacturing; Constructional features

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Manufacturing and constructional details of hand-propelled vehicles or sledges not otherwise provided for
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for fastening or securing elements together
